name: Aim Polygon
description:
RELEASE DATE: 9th January 2021-08:00 AM CET

AIM POLYGON: Improve your aiming skills in FPS games!

FPS games are very popular these years. On first person shooters, one of the most important thing to play well is your aim. You must aim the target to kill him/her and take advantage on the round. By playing Aim Polygon, you can improve your aiming skills and get better on  fps games.

How To Play

Shoot in randomly appeared targets with a rhythm to gain points. Avoid red targets. Shooting blue targets will result in +1 points and red targets will result in -5 points.

CUSTOM HDRI SKY OVERLAYS

You can change sky overlay image and feel yourself in anywhere while aiming.Just go Settings>Select HDRI
